import React, { useEffect }from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../component/Rating' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { useEffect(()=>{ const fatchPRoduct = async () =>{ const{data} = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) setProduct(data) } fatchPRoduct() },[match]) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price:{product.price} Descriptions:{product.description} Price: {product.price} Status: {product.countInStock>0 ?'In Stock': ' Out Of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
